msg: Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository
Fix batch of bugs in DataGrid and also add basic border and background styles.
DataGrid.as - Added style metadata for borderAlpha, borderColor, borderVisible, contentBackgroundAlpha, and contentBackgroundColor.
Grid.as - Add backing variable for variableRowHeight so it doesn't depend on gridDimensions.fixedRowHeight anymore.

GridLayout.as - Modified updateTypicalCellSizes() to set the fixedRowHeight to the maximum height of the typical cells when no rowHeight is set and variableRowHeight is false. Also, measuredHeight is now calculated only using the typical item instead of the content.
GridDimensions.as - Added getTypicalContentHeight() for GridLayout to calculate the measuredHeight. Also, we now reset the data structure when the columnCount is 0.
GridColumn.as - Invalidate the grid when dataField and labelFunction are set.
DataGridSkin.mxml - Changed background color to white, caret color to dark blue, and removed the rowBackground.
Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository

Added alternatingRowColors DataGrid style, alternatingRowColorsBackground DataGrid skin part, and IGridRowBackround interface.  If the new style is specified the alternatingRowColorsBackground DataGrid skin part becomes the grid's rowBackground.
Moved [Bindable] above the corresponding "grid" skin part metadata so that the grid skin part ASDoc shows up.
Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository
Revised DefaultGridItemRenderer: it now wraps text that doesn't fit, instead of "..." truncating.  This is now the default item renderer for the DataGrid skin.
QE notes: Changed the default item renderer for DataGridSkin from a group with an s:Label to DefaultGridItemRenderer, a UIComponent that contains a UITextField.
Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository
First round of changes for Spark DataGrid skinning.

DataGridSkin - Added alpha for disabled state and minWidth/minHeight. Altered the background/border/selection/hover/caret colors to XD specifications. Adjusted the label positioning and the ColumnHeaderBar size and positioning.
DefaultGridItemRenderer - Changed default padding on the left and right to 5. Changed the default height to 26 with padding of 5 on top and bottom.
GridLayout - removed the call to initializeGridElement since alternating row colors aren't default
ColumnHeaderBarLayout - Removed laying out the separators and forced the buttons to overlap one pixel.
Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository
The following changes apply to DataGrid only.
-Made some methods public in GridRowList to allow syncing to be implemented
-Added height="100%" to the label of the GridItemRenderer. This forces the label to stay within the bounds of the cell.
